short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract product tags from WordPress and Shopify websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Product Tag Extractor - Automatically Extract Tags from WordPress, Shopify

Save time and boost productivity by automatically extracting product tags from WordPress, Shopify. Perfect for e-commerce managers, marketers, and researchers who need quick access to product tag data.

Key Features:
• Smart Platform Detection - Automatically recognizes WordPress, Shopify
• Dual Extraction Technology - Combines DOM and API-based extraction for maximum coverage
• Intelligent Tag Processing - Consolidates, normalizes, and removes duplicates automatically
• Clean Interface - Simple one-click access to all product tags and statistics
• Performance Optimized - Smart caching and batch processing for fast results
• Offline Capable - Works even when API access isn't available

Why Install This Extension:

1. Save Valuable Time
   - Eliminate manual tag copying and searching
   - Get instant access to all product tags with one click
   - Batch process multiple products efficiently

2. Get Complete Tag Data
   - Captures tags from both visible elements and API data
   - Ensures no tags are missed with comprehensive extraction
   - Smart retry mechanism for reliable results

3. Works Where You Work
   - Full support for WordPress and WooCommerce
   - Complete Shopify integration
   - Works with both admin and public product pages

4. Enhanced Productivity
   - Centralized view of all product tags
   - Clean, normalized tag formatting
   - Easy copy and export options
   - Automatic tag organization

Perfect for:
• E-commerce managers tracking product organization
• Digital marketers researching market trends
• SEO specialists optimizing product listings
• Store owners managing product categories

Stop spending time on manual tag extraction - install Product Tag Extractor today and streamline your workflow.

Privacy: Works entirely in your browser with no data collection or external sharing.
